commandDescription: Extract code coverage information from a Salesforce instance and generate a report
flagReportFormatDescription: Please enter a report format, needs to be one of (all|text|clover|lcov|cobertura)
flagReportFormatLongDescription: Please enter the code coverage report formats
flagSourceLocationDescription: Please enter a location for the source code (default cwd)
flagSourceLocationLongDescription: Please enter a location for the source code (default cwd)
errorNoOrgResults: No test results found for the org '%s'. Please run Apex tests with code coverage.
